info.title: Globe Auth
info.description: API Reference for your Globe Auth

tags.name: Default
tags.description: Default endpoints that are included with Better Auth by default. These endpoints are not part of any plugin.

post.description: Sign in with a social provider

callbackURL.description: Callback URL to redirect to after the user has signed in

errorCallbackURL.description: Callback URL to redirect to if an error happens

disableRedirect.description: Disable automatic redirection to the provider. Useful for handling the redirection yourself

idToken.description: ID token from the provider to sign in the user with id token

scopes.description: Array of scopes to request from the provider. This will override the default scopes passed.

requestSignUp.description: Explicitly request sign-up. Useful when disableImplicitSignUp is true for this provider

400.description: Bad Request. Usually due to missing parameters, or invalid parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized. Due to missing or invalid authentication.

403.description: Forbidden. You do not have permission to access this resource or to perform this action.

404.description: Not Found. The requested resource was not found.

429.description: Too Many Requests. You have exceeded the rate limit. Try again later.

500.description: Internal Server Error. This is a problem with the server that you cannot fix.

post.description: Sign in with email and password

callbackURL.description: Callback URL to use as a redirect for email verification

rememberMe.description: If this is false, the session will not be remembered. Default is `true`.

post.description: Send a password reset email to the user

email.description: The email address of the user to send a password reset email to

redirectTo.description: The URL to redirect the user to reset their password. If the token isn't valid or expired, it'll be redirected with a query parameter `?error=INVALID_TOKEN`. If the token is valid, it'll be redirected with a query parameter `?token=VALID_TOKEN
